data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Clark, V. Ralph, Schrire, Brian D., Barker, Nigel P. (2015): Two new species of Indigofera L. (Leguminosae) from the Sneeuberg Centre of Floristic Endemism, Great Escarpment (Eastern and Western Cape, South Africa). PhytoKeys 48: 29-41, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.48.4798, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.48.4798
